text: Ligaria cuneifolia van Tigh, (syn. Psittacanthus cuneifolius (Ruiz et Pav.) Blume) is a shrubby, glabrous plant. It's fruit a globular berry. It is commonly known as “liga” (Argentina) or “quintral de espino” (Chile). ==Sources== *Baldini A, L Pancel.2002. Agentes de daño en el bosque nativo Editorial Universitaria Santiago de Chile *Fernández T B et al. 2000 Mistletoe from Argentine. Chap 5. pp. 61–74 in Büssing A. (ed.) Mistletoe: The Genus Viscum. CRC Press ==Other websites== * Domingezia (PDF) Category:Santalales
title: Ligaria cuneifolia
